ing: 1/2 cup cream cheese, at room temperature (optional)
des: "This recipe is very fast and easy. I experimented with it on some toast one day, it also goes well with fruit."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix together the honey, peanut butter, cinnamon and cream cheese until well blended. Cover and refrigerate for 24 hours. Serve on toast, or as a dip for fruit.
